Parameters: byte: A byte array, the contents of which should have been originally obtained from @B_android#telephony#mbms#DownloadRequest#toByteArray_E@.
fromSerializedRequest(byte[]).Description: This method constructs a new instance of @B_android#telephony#mbms#DownloadRequest#Builder_E@ based on the serialized data passed in.

setAppIntent(android.content.Intent).Description: Set the @B_android#content#Intent_E@ that should be sent when the download completes or fails. This should be an intent with a explicit @B_android#content#ComponentName_E@ targeted to a @B_android#content#BroadcastReceiver_E@ in the app's package. The middleware should not use this method.

Parameters: Uri: the source URI for the DownloadRequest to be built. This URI should never be null. This value must never be null.

Uri: The final location for the file(s) that are to be downloaded. It must be on the same filesystem as the temp file directory set via @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession#setTempFileRootDirectory_E@. The provided path must be a directory that exists. An @B_java#lang#IllegalArgumentException_E@ will be thrown otherwise. This value must never be null.

setSubscriptionId(int).Description: Set the subscription ID on which the file(s) should be downloaded.

setServiceInfo(android.telephony.mbms.Fi.Description: Sets the service from which the download request to be built will download from.

Returns: An instance of @B_android#telephony#mbms#DownloadRequest#Builder_E@ pre-populated with data from the provided @B_android#telephony#mbms#DownloadRequest_E@.
Parameters: DownloadRequest: The @B_android#telephony#mbms#DownloadRequest_E@ from which the data for the @B_android#telephony#mbms#DownloadRequest#Builder_E@ should come.
